downloadDescription: Version 1 of the S-MSRSeg was developed by Natural Language Computing Group at Microsoft Research Asia, and is released in 2004. Last published: February 14, 2008.
detailsSection:
Version 1 of the S-MSRSeg was developed by Natural Language Computing Group at Microsoft Research Asia, and is released in 2004. S-MSRSeg is a simplified version of the MSRSeg system (the generic segmenter) described in Gao et al. (2005), see cl-05.gao.pdf in this package. S-MSRSeg does not provide the functionalities of new word identification, morphology analysis, and standards adaptation.

Citation:
Jianfeng Gao, Mu Li, Andi Wu and Chang-Ning Huang.  Chinese word segmentation and named entity recognition: a pragmatic approach. Computational Linguistics, 31(4).
